Title: True Dromance
Writer: Sean Clements, Dominic Dierkes, Blake Anderson (creator), Adam Devine (creator), Anders Holm (creator), Kyle Newacheck (creator), Connor Pritchard (creator), Dominic Russo (creator), Bill Krebs (staff writer)
Actors: Blake Anderson, Adam Devine, Anders Holm, Jillian Bell
Plot: The guys cheat on Karl with a new drug dealer.
